about_the_game:
Voiceless is a cooperative horror game that can be played alone or with up to 4 players. Your goal is to survive making as little noise as possible, because any sound, including your microphone, can be heard by the Maniac, who is eager to catch you and your friends.



Realistic and beautiful graphics immerse you in the atmosphere of fear and anxiety, every corner of this dark game is filled with threat and mystery, making you afraid to look around the next dreadful turn.





In this captivating game, you'll experience unique gameplay where every rustle could prove deadly when facing the Maniac, whose attention is drawn to even the slightest sound. You'll explore the surrounding world, interacting with a variety of interior items that can be pushed, picked up, and thrown. These items will become your allies in the fight for survival: you can distract the Maniac or even temporarily incapacitate them. Additionally, you have the opportunity to use other players by setting them up with thrown objects.

The game offers both a single-player mode and the option to play cooperatively, where you can join forces with other players to achieve a common goal, helping and supporting each other, or act independently and even sabotage your comrades, which will affect rewards at the end of the match. Engage in this thrilling battle for survival and feel the atmosphere of tension and adrenaline, where every action you take matters.

content_descriptors.notes: Voiceless may contain content not suitable for all ages or for family viewing: Scenes of violence or cruelty, Adult content.
